Third Party Notices | Point Companion

Tools

This application uses SQLite to store data, which was made possible thanks to SQLite Portable Class Library. The licence can be found at https://sqlitepcl.codeplex.com/license.

This application uses UI for UWP to display historic data for individual points, which was made possible thanks to Progress Telerik. The licence can be found at https://github.com/telerik/UI-For-UWP/blob/master/LICENSE.md.
